courses.title: Graphic Design Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and composition.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Master the principles of UI/UX design to create user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.

courses.title: Advanced Photoshop Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your Photoshop skills with advanced techniques for photo editing and graphic creation.

courses.title: Illustrator for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with Adobe Illustrator and learn how to create stunning vector graphics.

courses.title: Web Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of web design, including HTML, CSS, and responsive design techniques.

courses.title: Motion Graphics with After Effects
courses.description: Dive into motion graphics and animation using Adobe After Effects.

courses.title: 3D Modeling with Blender
courses.description: Learn the essentials of 3D modeling and animation using Blender.

courses.title: Creative Typography
courses.description: Explore the art of typography and learn how to create visually appealing text designs.

courses.title: Digital Illustration Techniques
courses.description: Master digital illustration with techniques for creating stunning artwork.

courses.title: Design Thinking and Innovation
courses.description: Learn the principles of design thinking to drive innovation and solve complex problems.
